attributes.action: Refrendum in Jammu Kashmir State as Per UN resolutions under the auspices of UN
attributes.additional_details: Jammu Kashmir-JK is 7 decades longstanding issue between  people of Kashmir, Pakistan & India. This issue is on UN agenda since 1948. In recent development Indian Govt has stripped off special status of JK State, & has bolished the article 370 by going against the Indian constitution, bileteral agreements between two nuclear powers , & UN resolutions of 1948. Uni-lateral move by India has outraged the people of Muslim majority  state and there are fair chances of nuclear war between two States.
attributes.background:
This pettion demands British Govt as permanant member of the UNSC to bring  other 4 permanant members into an agreement,including India & Pakistan for refrendum in all parts of Jammu Kashmir State by giving people 3 options.
1- Independence 
2-Accession to Pakistan
3-Accession to India

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions which are about issues that are outside the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, this would require the agreement of other countries.
